title.narrative: NGO Support / Youth and community empowerment for integral health promotion

description.narrative: Peruvian leaders have developed a major concern about the high incidence of health problems that could be prevented with the participation of the community and schools. As part of these efforts, CEDRO has collaborated with Peruvian Health and Education Min istries developing strategies to prevent drug abuse and violence in school and families, especially in zones known as ?high risk zones?. The project aims to increase the awareness and information that will contribute to improve preventive health in childre n and youth at risk in Metropolitan Lima, specifically in the suburban districts of Rimac and La Victoria, fostering the involvement and participation of students, children and youth, as well as school authorities and parents? organizations. The implementa tion uses two main strategic lines: 1)intervention in community and schools 2)intervention in safe spaces for youth at high risk.
